episodes.title: Riders On The Storm
episodes.descr: With the fate of Beacon Hills hanging in the balance, Scott and his pack face off against Douglas in a final showdown.

episodes.title: Memory Found
episodes.descr: While Liam and Theo act as decoys, Scott, Lydia and Malia enact a desperate plan to try and remember Stiles.

episodes.title: Blitzkrieg
episodes.descr: Running out of time, Scott, Lydia and Malia decide to storm the rift in a desperate attempt to get Stiles back. Liam, Hayden and Mason make a deal with Theo in order to learn Douglas's real plan.

episodes.title: Ghosted
episodes.descr: Scott, Lydia and Malia search for clues about the Wild Hunt in a mysterious place called Canaan while Liam and Hayden resort to drastic measures in the fight against the Ghost Riders.

episodes.title: Radio Silence
episodes.descr: Running out of time, Scott, Lydia and Malia decide to storm the rift in a desperate attempt to get Stiles back. Liam, Hayden and Mason make a deal with Theo in order to learn Douglas's real plan.
